data.name: MeetinVR
data.description:
MeetinVR enables best-in-class metaverse meetings and collaboration. 

Whether you want to meet with your team or with your customers, MeetinVR provides the ideal platform for workshops, training, and education.

FEEL TRULY CONNECTED
From the first virtual handshake, MeetinVR makes people feel like they are closer together, boosting team cohesion and engagement. 

BRING ALL YOUR MEDIA INTO YOUR VR WORKSPACE
Import your images, videos, 360, presentations and 3D models into your beautiful VR rooms and use them during your workshop or presentations. 

DEFY THE LIMITATIONS OF REALITY 
Use the entire 3D space as your creative canvas in addition to whiteboards and screens. Draw in mid-air to express ideas more easily or create sticky notes just by speaking.

changelog.change_log:
-Add tutorial room

-Change application to utilize the new web platform

-Improve throw to delete detection

-Update Meta subscription users to support all team features

-Fix bugs in environment switching feature

-Fix notes menu not refreshing on changes

-Improve multiple buttons that were hard to select

-Add watermark for trial users

-Add watermark for guest users

-Improved team selection screen

-Add feature for linking/unlinking Meta account to existing account

-Fix an authorization issue that could occur when the app was running for a long time

-Add a more helpful message when your are logged into an account twice

-Fix avatar heads blocking controller beams

-Dozens of generic UI and networking fixes

- Quest 3 compatibility

- Whiteboard visibility improvements

- Reconnection fixes

- Fixed occasional wrong color of avatar hands and sleeves

- Note text overflow fixes

- Room thumbnail fixes

- More consistent throwing, less accidental drops

- Pen spawning fixes

- Avatar selection screen fixes

- Improved system for updating rooms

- Can no longer destroy the tablet while logging in

- Reduce app download size by around 200MB

- Fix situations where avatars could become invisible  

- Fix issue where you could not log back in after logging out  

- Improve compatibility range with other app versions
